scripts.pw:test: npm run bddgen && npm run playwright-test
scripts.qa-env: powershell -Command "$env:ENV='qa'; npx bddgen; npx playwright test
scripts.dev-env: powershell -Command "$env:ENV='dev'; npx bddgen; npx playwright test
scripts.prod-env: powershell -Command "$env:ENV='prod'; npx bddgen; npx playwright test
scripts.qa-test: npx bddgen && cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test
scripts.dev-test: npx bddgen && cross-env ENV=dev npx playwright test --headed
scripts.prod-test: npx bddgen && cross-env ENV=prod npx playwright test --headed
